mentionedBy.name: Fortinet Inc.
mentionedBy.notes: Major network security competitor following the 2004 acquisition of NetScreen Technologies for $4 billion. Juniper entered IT security in 2003 and was expanding enterprise segment presence, which represented one-third of revenues by 2005. Released first NAC product in late 2005.
